summary: Adds a trapdoor outside of the Riften stables for quick travel to the Ragged Flagon.
descriptionHtml:
A simple mod to make travel to the Ragged Flagon quicker.
It adds a trapdoor right outside of the Riften stable that takes you to the Ragged Flagon see the screenshots for the exact location. enjoy and comments and tips are always good help me improve :)

See the images for the new location of the ladder in Ragged Flagon

Install:
move the .esp file to your /skyrim/data folder

Requirements:
the newest version of skyrim

Conflicts:
maybe things that change the Riften stable and Ragged Flagon

v1.1
changed the location of the ladder in Ragged Flagon to fix clipping with the last ladder

Thanks to Kevelstone this was his Idea I just put it in the game
author: liberator369
